text: well I think Jeremy should take a little
more responsibility for what's going on
in the labour party after all we didn't
have this sort of abuse and intolerance
misogyny anti-semitism in the labour
party before Jeremy Corbyn became the
leader it's now become something that is
being talked about on television on
radio in our newspapers and angela is
right it has been effectively licensed
in the last nine months with a Labour
Party we've got to be about fairness and
tolerance and equality it's in our DNA
so for us to be reduced to this this
infighting is awful now I understand why
people feel passionately about the
future of our party but I feel
passionately about that I feel we're in
danger of splitting and being destroyed
but we can't tolerate and it isn't good
enough for Jeremy simply to say he has
threats to me well I have to death
threat I would threat to but I'm telling
him it's got to be stamped out we would
have zero tolerance of this in the
labour party
